actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent).

official_title: A resolution directing the Director of Central Intelligence to provide to the House of Representatives documents and factual information in possession of the Central Intelligence Agency about covert training or other support during the past year for counterterrorist units in the Middle East.

summary.text: Directs the Director of Central Intelligence to provide to the House of Representatives all information in its possession relating to covert training or other support of counterterrorist units against anti-American terrorists in Lebanon or other parts of the Middle East.

titles.title: A resolution directing the Director of Central Intelligence to provide to the House of Representatives documents and factual information in possession of the Central Intelligence Agency about covert training or other support during the past year for counterterrorist units in the Middle East.
